body.name: Non Stick Frying Pans Skillet, 10 Inch Titanium Frying Pans Nonstick, Ceramic Nonstick Frying Pan, Non Toxic, PFAS PFOA & PTFE Free, Dishwasher and Oven Safe, Compatible with All Cooktops
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 16 mins
features: Titanium Ceramic Technology: Scratch Resistant 1.5 Million Times, titanium ceramic is one of the highest quality coatings with excellent non-stick and frying properties, has excellent abrasion resistance and extreme long-lasting.

Healthy Non-Stick Coating: All Redchef non stick frying pans are free of PTFE, PFOA, PFAS, lead, cadmium and other toxic materials that can leach into your food, making them safe for you, your family and the environment.

Easy to Clean and Use: Our stainless steel frying pan is thoughtfully designed with a cooking surface that ensures even heat distribution, effortless food release, and hassle-free cleaning, making maintenance a breeze after every use. This stir frying pan is safe to use with metal utensils and features a stay cool hollow handle that doesn’t overheat on the stovetop.

Stoveto Agnostic & Oven Safe: This frying pan is made for any kitchen and cooktop. It can be used effectively on induction, gas, and electric stove tops, and is oven-safe up to 842°F, the perfect non stick frying pan for every kitchen!

Lifetime Assitant: Lifetime assitant and 10 years warranty, our greatest pursuit is to satisfy the needs of our consumers. This non stick frying pan is backed by full 10-YEAR WARRANTY and 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. Email our customer service and we will answer any of your questions/concerns. We offer 24/7 hours product support service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid construction elegant design
reviews.reviewText: Bought two, one for me and one for my daughter in law. Cooks evenly and we’ll, so far nothing sticks to it and is so easy to clean up. I followed directions, I put some oil or butter and started at low heat. When oil is hot or butter melted, I add whatever I want to cook and increase heat a little bit. I use wood or silicone spatula to stir. Even though the manufacturer claims it can take a lot of heat, I rather prefer to cook a lower temperature. The cooked food looks and tastes great. I am planning to buy a set of three frying pans on the future,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non-stick & easy clean up
reviews.reviewText: The non-stick feature works & it is very easy to just swipe clean then quick wash with a small amount of dish soap & water. The handle does not get hot & is long enough that fingers are never close to gas flame. It is the 11-inch model & with the sloped sides the pan makes it easy to flip foods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Treating myself to hopefully a good skillet
reviews.reviewText: Bought one at Christmas time as a gift, they loved it so now I'm buying me one. Hope its as good as she says. Usual find out products are not what they claim

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought This to Replace My Housemate's Worn Out Non-Stick Pan
reviews.reviewText: He loves the new pan. Says nothing sticks and pan is super easy to clean. He likes the look and heft of the pan, as well. (He's not easy to please, but I can tell he's excited about his new kitchen tool.) I'm happy to get rid of his old pan and for him to use a pan which has a more enviro and healthier composition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the best non-stick, induction pans I have ever gotten! (I have gotten quite a few.) Even heat, hi temp, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: My old "non stick" skillet had turned into a "stick" skillet! This new one does what it's supposed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: Only critique is the handle could be a bit longer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good product
reviews.reviewText: I love my new pan, non stick, very good quality
